amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: ? TITLE VIII--ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISIONS ? SEC. 801. None of the funds made available in title IV of this Act may be used for negotiating the participation of additional countries under the visa waiver program described in section 217 of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1187).
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit funds from being used for negotiating the participation of additional countries under the visa waiver program described in section 217 of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1187).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gingrey amendment (A054) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A054) offered by Mr. Gingrey.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gingrey amendment (A054) Failed by voice vote.
